Text: NOTE: If you're playing this on PC, it doesn't matter if it's PAL or NTSC, Enjoy.
Kinda of pointless since there was a PC version of the game...
@ioolo, not really, you can't play a PC game on PS2 console, but this gives you a choice to play on a chipped PAL PS2, or a PC which can produce better graphics than the PS2.
